titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on MDBS and HPBA.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 12/16/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the duty on dimethylbenzylidene sorbitol and 4,4'-isopropylidenedicyclohexanol through the earlier of: (1) December 31, 1990; or (2) the date on which the Secretary of Commerce publishes a notice in the Federal Register that the production capacity in the United States for such chemical is sufficient to meet domestic requirements.
